name: PEABODY COAL COMPANY, petitioner, v. DIRECTOR, OFFICE OF WORKERS' COMPENSATION PROGRAMS, DEPT. OF LABOR, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
PEABODY COAL COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
DIRECTOR, OFFICE OF WORKERS' COMPENSATION PROGRAMS, DEPT. OF LABOR, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
PEABODY COAL COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
DIRECTOR, OFFICE OF WORKERS' COMPENSATION PROGRAMS, DEPT. OF LABOR, et al.
No. 14-1278.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 29, 2016.
The Court approves the parties' agreed upon attorney's fee of $25,000, and expenses of $2,508.34 to be awarded by the Director, Office of Workers' Compensation Programs from the Black Lung Trust Fund to respondent Eva Elizabeth Hill.
